entry.p: Power rails which will turn off in S3-S5 sleep states.
I2C Voltage Level Translator, TCA9406 or equivalent.
Ensure the body diode of the FETs are connected as shown in the figure.
Devices such as a TTL compatible FET multiplexer/ demultiplexer.
10 kΩ for TCA9406. Rterm value is part dependent.
2.7 kΩ ± 5%. This is with the assumption of Rterm = 10 kΩ for U1, to achieve 2.2 kΩ of effective parallel resistance.
Effective parallel resistance of Rterm and R2
Minimize leakage current of inverter closest to DP connector to maintain input voltage level due to 1 Mohm pulldown resistor.
Nominal 100 nF recommended (75 nF to 200 nF including tolerance).
An edge rate reduction mechanism such as a 47 pF capacitor (Cs) terminated to VSS is recommended to comply with DisplayPort maximum Aux slew rate specification .
